channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Gianism
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Gianism

item.title: CVE-2024-3921|2024-05-29T06:00:02.135Z -- Unknown -- Gianism
item.description: The Gianism WordPress plugin through 5.1.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
